businesses.name: Mike's Majestic Movers
businesses.description: We provide furniture and accessory hauls for families and individuals who relocate. Whether far away or closeby, Mike's always has your back!

businesses.name: Tim's Tire Replacement Services
businesses.description: Providng tire replacements for any truck, car, or vehichle necessary. We got plenty of tires to choose from, especially new ones!

businesses.name: Turner's Plumbing Services
businesses.description: We are a plumbing business that serves people in the Tri-Hamptons. We can provide repairment and installation for pipes and fixtures in your house at anytime! Just call and make an appointment today!

businesses.name: Stallion Door Delivery
businesses.description: We deliver and sell doors for people. People can order doors from our websites which give you all of the information (measurements, colors, handles, etc). Our delivery hours our from 10-7 on Tuesdays through Saturdays.

businesses.name: Honorable Hamptons
businesses.description: Composed of top creative-writing journalists, we write articles on weekly events both past and present, recap different events in the community, and recognize notable people who make differences in the community, with their permission to write about.

businesses.name: Umbrellas Galore
businesses.description: We are an umbrella shop located on Newman Avenue. We have a variety of unqiue and colorful umbrellas to choose from. Prices vary depending on the size and the condition of the umbrella. You can purchase therm in the store or order them on our website at umbrellasgalore.com/shop

businesses.name: Global Gadget Foundation
businesses.description: We belive that a world is a place of freedom and love. We run food and supply drives to families or individuals around the world who are in poverty, or who are desperately in need. We run our drives at different locations (churches, schools, shopping centers) in the community.

businesses.name: Game on-the-Go!
businesses.description: We offer video game rentals for people of all ages who own video game consoles. Our purpose is to give individuals a taste of what certain video games that have never been played before are like. If they enjoy it, then we give them a discount for when they purchase the actual game at a store.

businesses.name: Carl's Cleaners
businesses.description: We are a cleaning company that provide cleaning for local schools, stores, or facilities. We are composed of a team of well-trained and experienced janitors who dedicate their time and effort to high-level cleaning.
